changelog.title: Interactive Labs Sprint
changelog.description: Hands-on labs added to CLH-001, 006-009, 011-014. Practice commands in simulated terminals.

changelog.title: Tool Workshop
changelog.description: Build production-grade security tools with validation for shebang, logging, getopts, and output formatting.

changelog.title: Security Simulators
changelog.description: Network recon (nmap), web enumeration (curl/robots.txt), and incident response (evidence collection) labs.

changelog.title: Learn by Doing
changelog.description: Each lab has objectives, simulated environments, and real-time feedback on command execution.
